_header: O mankind / Have in thy mind
Subjects: Christ, appeal of, to man; dialogues, Christ and man
_description: Appeal of Christ to man by the pains of his Passion — one 6-line stanza

BodTan407.Transcription:
[O] man unkyndeHave thow in myndeMy passion smerteAnd thow
                    schalt me ffyndeto the ryght kyndeLo here myn [ ]
BodTan407.Note: Last word omitted and a heart outlined in red inserted.
